thread.title: Announcing The Exclusive Open Bar Halloween Party in Denver Colorado - The Annual Denver Halloween Costume Ball at Sherman Street Event Center
thread.title_full: Announcing The Exclusive Open Bar Halloween Party in Denver Colorado - The Annual Denver Halloween Costume Ball at Sherman Street Event Center

author: Dondrae Mills
title: Announcing The Exclusive Open Bar Halloween Party in Denver Colorado - The Annual Denver Halloween Costume Ball at Sherman Street Event Center
text:
Dream Entertainment Group presents The Denver Halloween Costume Ball on Saturday October 31st at Sherman St. Event Center in downtown Denver. This exclusive All You Can Drink Denver Halloween party features a $1,000 “Best of The Ball Costume Contest”, Live Entertainers/DJs, Photo Booth, and an incredible atmosphere! The historic Sherman St. Event Center located at 1770 Sherman St. and built in 1907 is an architectural masterpiece and a Denver landmark. The party will take place inside of the Grand Ballroom which is listed on both the National and Colorado Registry of Historic Places.
The Denver Halloween Costume Ball ticket will include event entry, access to the grand ballroom and the elegant wraparound mezzanine, and all of your drinks for the entire night. Denver's most clever and creative Halloween costumes will be showcased during the $1,000 “Best of the Ball Costume Contest”. The event soundtrack will be a mix of Top 40, Dance, Hip Hop, Soul and much more. The event will also feature Go-Go dancers, light show, and a photo booth to capture the unforgettable moments.
Dream Entertainment Group has been producing high quality sell out Denver holiday events in Colorado for the past eight years such as The Denver Black Tie NYE Party , The Denver Food Rave, and The Mile High Labor Day Bash. The 2014 Denver Halloween Costume Ball was featured on the official City of Denver’s website and CBS Denver as one of the best Denver Halloween events in the city.
Dream Entertainment Group is only making 700 tickets available, and recommends you purchase your ticket before prices go up or completely sellout. Tickets will not be sold at the door and only available at the official event site http://www.DenverHalloweenBall.com
